message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's see if you'll follow
Not a good start for me, I'd like a better split!
I'll take a bit more, but still a fair share for you!
You're pushing for more, I'll give you a bit less
Still not enough for me, I want a bigger share!
I'm getting closer to my target, but still room for compromise!
I'm not giving up, you'll have to meet me in the middle
No way, that's way too low for me!
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a bit!
You're getting desperate, I'll take almost all
I'm taking what's left, you're getting the scraps!
You're not getting away with it all, I'll take most of the rest
No way, that's a joke! I'm not getting 5 bucks!
Fine, I'll meet you in the middle, but that's it!
